name: GIANT SPIDER

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.text: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and it knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
actions.text: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature the spider can see within 60 feet. Failure: The target has the Restrained condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage).

AC 14 	Initiative +3 (13)

Speed 30 ft., Climb 30 ft.
